caption.p: Overview of ProCID study design. CIDP, chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyradiculoneuropathy; INCAT, inflammatory neuropathy cause and treatment; I‐RODS, inflammatory Rasch‐built overall disability scale; IVIg, intravenous immunoglobulin; MCID‐SE, minimum clinically important difference‐SE; PGIC, patient global impression of change
